column5: Home in Katy right off the highway near shopping and easy access to freeways, grocery, and fastfood/restaurants. In a quiet neighborhood. family friendly. 1,789 sq feet, big backyard for any purpose. Bright light kitchen ceiling fan in all rooms. 3 bedrooms, garage, fireplace, space for air mattresses as well as 3 beds for use. Easy accomadations great for families or parties etc. close commute to super bowl!!
column8: Super Bowl Rooms House for rent
